{{cpp/title|log10{{small|(std::valarray)}}}}
{{cpp/numeric/valarray/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=valarray|1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
valarray&lt;T&gt; log10( const valarray&lt;T&gt;&amp; va );
}}

For each element in {{c|va}} computes common (base 10) logarithm of the value of the element. 

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|va|value array to apply the operation to}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
Value array containing common logarithms of the values in {{c|va}}.

===Notes===
{{cpp/numeric/valarray/notes unq|log10}}

{{cpp/numeric/valarray/notes ret|log10}}

===Possible implementation===
{{cpp/numeric/valarray/impl|log10}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;cmath&gt;
#include &lt;iomanip&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;valarray&gt;

void show(char const* title, const std::valarray&lt;float&gt;&amp; va)
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; title &lt;&lt; " : " &lt;&lt; std::right;
    for (float x : va)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; std::setw(6) &lt;&lt; x;
    std::cout &lt;&lt; '\n';
}

int main()
{
    const std::valarray&lt;float&gt; n{-2.f, -1.f, 0.f, 1.f, 2.f, 3.f, INFINITY};
    const std::valarray&lt;float&gt; pow10{std::pow(10.f, n)};
    const std::valarray&lt;float&gt; log10_pow10{std::log10(pow10)};

    show("n      ", n);
    show("10ⁿ    ", pow10);
    show("lg(10ⁿ)", log10_pow10);
}
|output=
n       :     -2    -1     0     1     2     3   inf
10ⁿ     :   0.01   0.1     1    10   100  1000   inf
lg(10ⁿ) :     -2    -1     0     1     2     3   inf
}}
